tool.name: FileInfo
tool.description: Shows basic information about the file, such as data ranges and file type.
tool.command:
FileInfo
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_out_tsv: -out_tsv $param_out_tsv #end if #if $param_m: -m #if " " in str($param_m): "$param_m" #else $param_m #end if #end if #if $param_p: -p #if " " in str($param_p): "$param_p" #else $param_p #end if #end if #if $param_s: -s #if " " in str($param_s): "$param_s" #else $param_s #end if #end if #if $param_d: -d #if " " in str($param_d): "$param_d" #else $param_d #end if #end if #if $param_c: -c #if " " in str($param_c): "$param_c" #else $param_c #end if #end if #if $param_v: -v #if " " in str($param_v): "$param_v" #else $param_v #end if #end if #if $param_i: -i #if " " in str($param_i): "$param_i" #else $param_i #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_m
param.label: Show meta information about the whole experiment

param.name: param_s
param.label: Computes a five-number statistics of intensities, qualities, and widths

param.name: param_d
param.label: Show detailed listing of all spectra and chromatograms (peak files only)

param.name: param_c
param.label: Check for corrupt data in the file (peak files only)

param.name: param_v
param.label: Validate the file only (for mzML, mzData, mzXML, featureXML, idXML, consensusXML, pepXML)

param.name: param_i
param.label: Check whether a given mzML file contains valid indices (conforming to the indexedmzML standard)

tool.help:
Shows basic information about the file, such as data ranges and file type.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_FileInfo.html
